title: Term Paper With Whale
subtitle: Professor notices omission of whale drawing from marine biology term paper resubmitted several times by different students.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A student in a marine biology class turns in a term paper which includes a lavishly-drawn illustration of a whale and receives an A.  The next year a different student copies the paper, submits it, and also receives an A.  The third student to hand in the same paper, however, neglects to include the drawing of the whale and receives only a B from the professor and his written comment: “I liked it better with the whale.”
